s.text: Our loan interest rate is as low as 3% per annum depending on the loan, amount and repayment period.
We offer loans to individuals, small business firms and all kinds of business financing in any part of the world with ease and greater flexibility.
Date: Tue, 2 Nov 2010 02:26:26 +0100 (CET) Subject: We offer up to $5,000,000.00 loan,reply for details From: "Maria Fletcher" <relosegui@seyprel.com> To: undisclosed-recipients: ;
